episodes.title: Scientology's Evil Disconnection Policy - Phil Jones
episodes.description:
#Cults often isolate their members by enforcing disconnection with non-believers. Scientology is a cult that literally has an ACTUAL policy of doing just that. Phil Jones lost contact with his children over a decade ago, they are part of Scientology's Sea Organisation. Phil continues to speak out against Scientology abuses with the hope of reconnecting with his children. 
#ScientolologyDisconnection #cultawareness 

Subscribe to Phil at @phildoggo and check out his videos for even more stories of his experiences in Scientology. 

📡 Under the Radar / Need help leaving Scientology? These charities were set up to help people like you! 
https://sptvfoundation.org/   
https://www.theaftermathfoundation.org/ 

🎙️ Have you been involved with a high control group/ cult or MLM? If you'd like to share your story on this channel, please fill in the google form here: 
https://forms.gle/SxDyoSdXP2138S1v6

🚁 Channel memberships! Join my amazing propellers for members-only perks! 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6q1t92tB_nPPWkW76Gzeww/join

📸 Social Media 
https://linktr.ee/kellicopter 

Video Chapters:
0:00 A Family Shattered: The Pain of Disconnection - Introduction to Phil Jones and the   devastating impact of Scientology's disconnection policy on his life.
1:10 From Believer to Outcast: A Journey of Disillusionment - Phil's 40-year journey in Scientology, from devoted member to outspoken critic.
3:15 The Facebook Police, OSA - How Scientology's control extends to personal relationships and the consequences of defiance.
6:51 Disconnected: The Brutal Reality - The swift and devastating consequences of being declared "suppressive" and losing all contact with loved ones.
11:47 Scientology's School of Conformity - Examining the role of Scientology schools in indoctrinating children and grooming them for the Sea Org.
16:35 Close Calls and the Billboard That Rocked the World - Phil's brushes with Scientology's disciplinary system and the birth of the "Call Me" campaign.
21:15 Protests, TV Shows, and a Desperate Fight for Recognition - Phil's relentless efforts to reach his children and expose Scientology's practices.
26:33 From $70 to Thousands: The Power of Collective Action - How the "Call Me" campaign became a symbol of hope for Disconnected Families.
33:28 The Uncertain Future and the Fight Continues - Phil's reflections on his journey, the challenges ahead, and his hopes for the future.
38:26 United We Stand: The Power of Protest and Online Activism - Phil's perspective on the growing movement against Scientology and the importance of unity.
47:55 The Unfathomable: Disconnecting from Family and Investing in Scientology - Exploring the mindset behind Scientology's disconnection policy and the financial burden it places on members.
58:05 Mentally Out, Physically In: The Under the Radar Struggle - Describing the difficult reality of those still trapped within Scientology and Phil's own journey to freedom.

episodes.title: My Last Conversation with Doug Kramer | Scientology and Hollywood
episodes.description:
This never-before-seen interview was filmed in November 2023. It is my last conversation with my friend Doug Kramer before he passed away less than a month later Initially, I wasn't sure if I would ever share this with you all because I couldn't bring myself to watch the interview until very recently. Doug had so much wisdom to share, even in this casual setting. 

I find myself feeling envious of the blissful ignorance we both had, not realising that this would be our final conversation. We discussed Hollywood and how Scientology recruits young actors who are trying to make it in the industry.
@dbnc 


Join this channel to get access to the perks:

episodes.title: When Scientology Kids Grow Up.- Bianca Larsson Lanciai
episodes.description:
When Scientology kids grow up. The organisation did not consider that those same kids would use their voices to expose what happened to them. Bianca Larsson Lanciai was introduced to Scientology at just 2 years old after her parents joined the sea organisation, she too would sign her billion year contract as a child and resort to desperate measures to escape. 

Join me in this interview as Bianca shares her story. #NoMoreKidsInScientology #scientology #cults

episodes.title: Leaving Scientology With The Man Who Made it Famous | Jeff Hawkins
episodes.description:
Today I am joined by the wonderful Jeff Hawkins who recounts his journey of leaving Scientology after creating an advertising campaign that put Scientology on the map. We discuss the abuse he suffered at the hands of David Miscavige  and how Jeff has approached recovery since leaving the Cult. 

You can buy Jeff's books here :

episodes.title: I took the Scientology Personality Test so you don’t have to.
episodes.description:
I took a Scientology personality test! Online…so you don’t have to. I filmed the results in case you are curious like me 😉 Please be aware that if you take this test they will be phoning you and they will be trying to sell you a course. I personally think these tests are quite degrading and I believe they could be dangerous if used to manipulate vulnerable people. 

I am currently editing episode 3 of the Scientology iceberg series  thank you for the support I have recieved!  if you haven’t see it yet you can watch part 1 and 2 here: 

https://youtu.be/4hLHLmUa4qI - Scientology Iceberg explained Part 1: My story. The 6 year old SP

https://youtu.be/Vvbe4WBrCWU - Scientology Iceberg explained Part 2: The Tip ( Celebrities front groups and money!) 

I grew up in Scientology, now we are taking a look at what this multi billion dollar organisation is really all about. I thought this needed it’s own moment. Many people take the test, for a joke, for fun or because they are seeking help. By all means if you want to do it. Go ahead but I thought it would be in the interest of the public to see an example of the results you might get. 

The aim of these tests are to get you to pay for books, courses and even DVD’s. Be aware and be careful ❤️
